Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define APR_FILE_ATTR_EXECUTABLE   0x02

File is executable

#define APR_FILE_ATTR_HIDDEN   0x04

File is hidden

#define APR_FILE_ATTR_READONLY   0x01

File is read-only
